how_it_works.title: 1. Pick your favourite eCard
how_it_works.description: Buy an eCard or gift it to a friend.

how_it_works.title: 2. The eCard cashback is instantly added into your Fave account
how_it_works.description: Tap on 'My Cashback' on the homepage to see the eCard cashback balance and validity period.

how_it_works.title: 3. Redeem cashback simply with FavePay
how_it_works.description: At the partner's outlet, scan the FavePay QR as usual. Upon payment, your cashback balance will be deducted automatically.

how_it_works.title: 4. Pick your favourite online store
how_it_works.description: Buy an exciting food and other services.

details.title: In-store
details.description: At the outlet, inform the staff before you swipe to redeem. Then, show the redemption code to the staff.
